3D Interface for Data Browsing

This project aims to improve the data query process when using data portals by visualizing metadata. Additionally, space time cube is used here to visualize time information with height representing time.
In order to evaluate the visualization method, Jiangsu province, which is one of the most economically active provinces in China, is utilized here as the test area. Geographic, economic, social, and nighttime light data of each city are shown.
You can explore this visualization platform first and then answer the questions.

Explore >>

Information
3D Interface for Data Browsing
X
3D Interface for Data Browsing

Here we use economic data, geographic data, social data, and nighttime light data for evaluation.

Economic data are collected from National Earth System Science Data Center on March 17th, 2019. It covers information of important economic indicators for each city in Jiangsu province. Geographic data are downloaded from National Catalogue Service For Geographic Information on June, 2018. It records the border of each city. Social data used here are the locations of published paper's authors' institutions, obtained from ACMDL. Nighttime light data are the digital number(DN) value results calculated from visible infrared imaging radiometer suite(VIIRS), published in EARTHDATA.

In order to provide better overview of all mentioned data and assist in data browsing and querying process, several metadata are selected and visualized. Color hue, size,and saturation are used to visualize data categroy, data size,and data quality seperately. Since data quality has many components, we select attribute completeness here to indicate the quality of each data. For the basemap design, color value is used to represent total amount of data in each city of Jiangsu province.


Design, Development, Data & Modelling - Mengyao Gao
Program - Cartography M.Sc. of TUM
Map engine - Mapbox GL JS
Graphing engine - Three.js
